biotools.summary:
Incorporating neighbor genotypic identity into genome-wide association studies of field herbivory.

R source codes, accession list, and phenotype data used in "Neighbor GWAS: incorporating neighbor genotypic identity into genome-wide association studies of field herbivory on Arabidopsis thaliana" by Yasuhiro Sato, Eiji Yamamoto, Kentaro K. Shimizu and Atsushi J. Nagano

bioschemas.name: neighbor GWAS
